name: Reda
text: Thank you for this super amazing stay. We highly recommend ❤️

name: Najat
text: I am a frequent guest here, For me its pure relaxation to stay here with amazing food the staff are friendly The animals on the Domaine are an excellent asset when you visit with kids I see see much more potential for this property it can easily become a 5* Domaine

name: Abou
text: Clean and very beautiful room and grounds

name: Camelia
text: Great potential. Reception was very accommodating when we arrived and had a challenge with the booking dates. They sorted it out and got us situated within the hours. The animal park is a great attraction with the children and the property has beautiful grounds. The fire by the dinner was a great experience and Monkey beach is beautifully done.

name: Anonymous
text: Very very noisy on Saturday night. The monkey beach music is too loud and make it difficult for families with small kids. This place is very kids friendly and we don’t understand the monkey beach concept in such place -> it’s a pity to think that they just created that bar to attract another type of guests and maximise profit. This is not the first time we come and we were as well desapointed to see that the ostriches space was so small. They use to run in a larger space and the poor creatures looked miserable

name: Anonymous
text: Very helpful staff they will do anything to help anytime,

name: Faycal
text: la partie zoo dans le domaine

name: Ghizlaine
text: personnel au petit soin. hyper gentil. cadre très propre. vraiment très agréable.

name: Antoine
text: Domaine exceptionnel, animaux en liberté régulièrement dans la journée . Piscine immense et gentillesse du personnel .
